# Daten laden und bereinigen

```{r}
filename <- "data/clickbaitdata.csv"
raw <- readSurvey (filename)

raw %>%
  filter(Status == "IP Address") %>% 
  filter(Progress == 100) -> raw

raw.short <- raw[,c(-1:-17, -21, -139:-140)]

raw.head <- raw.short[,c(-1:-22, -119:-120)]

#write.csv2(raw.head, "data/raw.head.csv")
```

```{r, Kategoriale und numerische Variablen}
raw.short$Gender <- as.factor(raw.short$Gender)
raw.short$Ausbildung <- as.factor(raw.short$Ausbildung)
raw.short$Age <- as.numeric(raw.short$Age)



```

#Faktorenberechnung

```{r bfi_10, skillscale}
raw.short %>% select(starts_with("BigFive10")) %>%  get_label()

bfi_keys <- list(bfi_o = c("-BigFive10_5", "BigFive10_10"),
                 bfi_c = c("-BigFive10_3","BigFive10_8"),
                 bfi_e = c("-BigFive10_1", "BigFive10_6"),
                 bfi_a = c("BigFive10_2","-BigFive10_7"),
                 bfi_n = c("-BigFive10_4", "BigFive10_9"))

psych::scoreItems(bfi_keys, raw.short, impute = "median", min = 1, max =6)

resbfi <- psych::scoreItems(bfi_keys, raw.short, impute = "median", min = 1, max =6)

raw.short %>% bind_cols(as_tibble(resbfi$scores))

raw.short %>% select(starts_with("InternetSkillScale")) %>%  get_label()

skill_keys <- list(skills = c("InternetSkillScale_1", 
                              "InternetSkillScale_2", 
                              "InternetSkillScale_3", 
                              "InternetSkillScale_4", 
                              "InternetSkillScale_5", 
                              "-InternetSkillScale_6", 
                              "-InternetSkillScale_7", 
                              "-InternetSkillScale_8"))

psych::scoreItems(skill_keys, raw.short, impute ="median", min = 1, max = 6)

resskills<- psych::scoreItems(skill_keys, raw.short, impute ="median", min = 1, max = 6)

raw.short %>% bind_cols(as_tibble(resskills$scores))


```

```{r, semantisches Differenzial Politik}
my_dodge = position_dodge(width = 0.3)

dfpol_1 <- dfpol %>% pivot_longer(cols = starts_with("sd")) %>% 
   separate(col = name, into = c("name", "Schlagzeile"), sep = "_")
## Recoding dfpol_1$name into dfpol_1$name_rec
dfpol_1$name_rec <- fct_recode(dfpol_1$name,
               "Informativ" = "sd1",
               "Klar" = "sd2",
               "Eindeutig" = "sd3",
               "Nüchtern" = "sd4",
               "Emotionslos" = "sd5",
               "Interessant" = "sd6",
               "Seriös" = "sd7")

## Recoding dfpol_1$Einstellung into dfpol_1$Einstellung_rec
dfpol_1$Schlagzeile <- fct_recode(dfpol_1$Schlagzeile,
               "Clickbait Polizeiwache" = "sz3",
               "Non-Clickbait AfD" = "sz4",
               "Non-Clickbait Übergangsfonds" = "sz1")

labelslinks <- c("Informativ", "Klar", "Eindeutig", "Nüchtern", "Emotionslos", "Interessant", "Seriös")
labelsrechts <- c("Uninformativ", "Unklar", "Mehrdeutig", "Reißerisch", "Emotional", "Uninteressant", "Unseriös")

  
dfpol_1 %>%   
ggplot()+
  aes(x = as.numeric(name_rec), y = value, group = Schlagzeile
, color = Schlagzeile) +
  stat_summary(fun.data = "mean_se", position = my_dodge) +
  stat_summary(fun.data = "mean_se", geom ="line", position = my_dodge)+
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(1,5), breaks = 1:6, name = "Bewertung")+
  scale_x_continuous(name = "Dimension", breaks = 1:7, labels = labelslinks,
                     sec.axis = sec_axis(~.,
                                         breaks = 1:7,
                                         labels = labelsrechts))+
  labs (title = "Clickbait-Schlagzeilen aus dem Themengebiet Politik werden negativer
bewertet als Non-Clickbait-Schlagzeilen.",
        caption = "n = 123",
        subtitle = "Semantisches Differenzial zu der Bewertung von Online-Schlagzeilen ")+
  coord_flip()

#ggsave("Semantisches Differenzial Politik.jpeg")
```

```{r, semantisches Differenzial für Kultur}
   separate(col = name, into = c("name", "Schlagzeile"), sep = "_")
## Recoding dfpol_1$name into dfpol_1$name_rec
dfcult_1$name_rec <- fct_recode(dfcult_1$name,
               "Informativ" = "sd1",
               "Klar" = "sd2",
               "Eindeutig" = "sd3",
               "Nüchtern" = "sd4",
               "Emotionslos" = "sd5",
               "Interessant" = "sd6",
               "Seriös" = "sd7")

## Recoding dfpol_1$Einstellung into dfpol_1$Einstellung_rec
dfcult_1$Schlagzeile <- fct_recode(dfcult_1$Schlagzeile,
              "Clickbait Katzenberger" = "sz5",
               "Non-Clickbait Trennung Will" = "sz6",
               "Non-Clickbait Rezo" = "sz9",
              "Clickbait Heiratsantrag" = "sz10",
              "Clickbait Klum Halloween" = "sz12")


  
dfcult_1 %>%   
ggplot()+
  aes(x = as.numeric(name_rec), y = value, group = Schlagzeile
, color = Schlagzeile) +
  stat_summary(fun.data = "mean_se", position = my_dodge) +
  stat_summary(fun.data = "mean_se", geom ="line", position = my_dodge)+
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(1,5), breaks = 1:6, name = "Bewertung")+
  scale_x_continuous(name = "Dimension", breaks = 1:7, labels = labelslinks,
                     sec.axis = sec_axis(~.,
                                         breaks = 1:7,
                                         labels = labelsrechts))+
  labs (title = "Clickbait-Schlagzeilen aus dem Themengebiet Kultur werden negativer 
bewertet als Non-Clickbait-Schlagzeilen.",
        caption = "n = 123",
        subtitle = "Semantisches Differenzial zu der Bewertung von Online-Schlagzeilen ")+
  coord_flip()

ggsave("Semantisches Differenzial Kultur.jpeg")
```

```{r, semantisches DIfferenzial Wirtschaft}
   separate(col = name, into = c("name", "Schlagzeile"), sep = "_")
## Recoding dfpol_1$name into dfpol_1$name_rec
dfeco_1$name_rec <- fct_recode(dfeco_1$name,
               "Informativ" = "sd1",
               "Klar" = "sd2",
               "Eindeutig" = "sd3",
               "Nüchtern" = "sd4",
               "Emotionslos" = "sd5",
               "Interessant" = "sd6",
               "Seriös" = "sd7")

## Recoding dfpol_1$Einstellung into dfpol_1$Einstellung_rec
dfeco_1$Schlagzeile <- fct_recode(dfeco_1$Schlagzeile,
              "Clickbait Gates Energiewunder" = "sz2",
              "Non-Clickbait Dienstwagen" = "sz7", 
              "Clickbait Raketen" = "sz8",
               "Clickbait WhatsApp Verbot" = "sz11")

  
dfeco_1 %>%   
ggplot()+
  aes(x = as.numeric(name_rec), y = value, group = Schlagzeile
, color = Schlagzeile) +
  stat_summary(fun.data = "mean_se", position = my_dodge) +
  stat_summary(fun.data = "mean_se", geom ="line", position = my_dodge)+
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(1,5), breaks = 1:6, name = "Bewertung")+
  scale_x_continuous(name = "Dimension", breaks = 1:7, labels = labelslinks,
                     sec.axis = sec_axis(~.,
                                         breaks = 1:7,
                                         labels = labelsrechts))+
  labs (title = "Clickbait- und Non-Clickbait-Schlagzeilen aus dem Themengebiet 
Wirtschaft werden gleich bewertet.",
        caption = "n = 123",
        subtitle = "Semantisches Differenzial zu der Bewertung von Online-Schlagzeilen ")+
  coord_flip()

ggsave("Semantisches Differenzial Wirtschaft.jpeg")
```
